body: I'm happy with either solution. The caveat being that we have to make sure that this works on all platforms we (want to) support (incl. Windows and ARM). I agree depending on nasm isn't a problem assuming it's portable. I also agree that it would be nice to avoid an extra configuration question. I wasn't aware we had a complete bazel build. @jart can you add that file to tensorflow so @mkolod can use it?

body_text: I'm happy with either solution. The caveat being that we have to make sure that this works on all platforms we (want to) support (incl. Windows and ARM). I agree depending on nasm isn't a problem assuming it's portable. I also agree that it would be nice to avoid an extra configuration question. I wasn't aware we had a complete bazel build. @jart can you add that file to tensorflow so @mkolod can use it?
